metadata.title: CVE-2024-32661 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol. FreeRDPbased clients prior to version 3.5.1 are vulnerable to a possible `NULL`access and crash. Version 3.5.1 contains a patch for the issue. No knownworkarounds are available.

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
